move(int, int, int, int, int, boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualView
This method controls if the box given by the player is reachable: if it is, the method calls the movePlayer method in the controller, otherwise it sends an update of the board and sends again the request to choose a reachable box

moveWorker(Worker, Box) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.god.MoveWorkerTwice
This method implements the ability to move twice the same worker and it doesn't allow to move back at the first move start position

moveWorker(Worker, Box) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.god.ShiftWorker
This method moves the chosen worker in a position that is occupied by an opponent worker and shift the opponent worker in the same direction of the player move
moveWorker(Worker, Box) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.god.SwitchWorker
